page.title: 19Non-farm jobs(1):SW.Cheshire
page.content: In Hatton Heath,7 people are employed at what was a petrol filling station, to repair & sell motor mowers.Also sold are greenhouses & garden sheds now displayed on the old forecourt. There is also a small firm,employing 2 which buys secondhand light commercial pick-up trucks & vans eg.Ford,Honda, & reconditions them for re-sale.There is a motor engineer who will carry out servicing,repairs,respraying,welding & fit exhausts as well as having a breakdown truck.All of these rely on their position on the A41 road for trade but the kennels breeding cocker spaniels advertises itself through dog shows(a winning dog being of more value).It is licenced to keep 20 dogs for show but is not a boarding kennels & is more of a lucrative hobby than a job.A Saighton dairy farm does cater for the holiday boarding of cats.
